conversation.question: How many rug(s) are in this room?

How many picture(s) are in this room?
How many box(s) are in this room?
How many basket(s) are in this room?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (curtain, table, fridge, box) is the closest to the sofa in this PANORAMA?
Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (sofa, lamp, tv, chair) is the closest to the box in this PANORAMA?

Measuring from the closest point of each object, which of these objects (box, tv, basket, chair) is the closest to the sink in this PANORAMA?

If I am standing by the tv and facing the closest sofa, is the closest box to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the basket and facing the closest chair, is the closest trash_can to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the lamp and facing the closest chair, is the closest tv to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
If I am standing by the basket and facing the closest lamp, is the closest sink to my front, back, left, right, front-left, front-right, back-left, or back-right in this PANORAMA?
